step_data.thought:
Looking at the current page state, I can see that we're now in the Invoices section of the Sales module. The URL indicates we're at 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/sales/invoice/' and we can see a list of invoices in the table. 

So far, we've successfully navigated to:
1. The Sales section (clicked on SALES in the menu)
2. The Orders section (previously visited)
3. The Invoices section (current page)

The only remaining section mentioned in the user's goal is Shipments. To complete the user's request, I should navigate to the Shipments section. I can do this by clicking on the SALES menu again to see all options, and then clicking on the Shipments option.

I can see the SALES link in the navigation menu with element ID [175]. I'll click on it to expand the menu and access the Shipments option.
